extension.description: Stream a wide selection of mp4 mkv tv shows from Streams 4 U The tv shows aka tv.newmyvideolinks couple of issues 1- script fail if no more pages 2- tv shows link shows up at the bottem of episodes NO big problems to report links supported are Netload Turobit 180upload real-debrid or alldebrid account NEEDED for help on this addon please goto xbmc hub
